page.title: 06WOODFORD FIREWORK FACTORY
page.content: The only large industry in the village is a factory which manufactures signals and flares for the Army, Navy & Air Force. It is a light industry and women are more suited to assemble the delicate parts of the products. These women change their clothes on arrival and wear everything made from cotton. At the end of the day they have a shower and change back into their own clothes. Many of the workers live in the village , and a private bus brings workers from Salisbury. The products are not dangerous. The flares and coloured signals are used by the Services for training. They can be used as signals or smoke screens during exercises. . This factory is owned by an American company, but the research work is done in the village factory.
